alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 4:32AM CDT until May 29 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN LYON COUNTY... At 432 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Lester, or near Rock Rapids, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Rock Rapids around 440 AM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
